bibl.title: Joseph Walton v. L. C. Smith. Certificate
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US Circuits Courts, Western District of Washington, Seattle; Law Register Northern Division, 1899-1906, vol 2

org.placeName: Ninth Judicial Circuit. Western District of Washington, Northern Division.

div1.p: United States of America, Western District of Washington}

I, James C. Drake, Clerk of the Circuit Court of the United States, for the Western District of Washington, do hereby certify that the foregoing attached papers constitue the JUDGEMENT ROLL in the foregoing entitled cause, No. 1376 wherein in re: Joseph Walton Habeas Corpus.
In Testimony Whereof, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed the Seal of said Circuit Court, this the 22nd day of DEC. A.D. 1911.
By B. O. Wright, Deputy Clerk
